scripts.dev: npm run build:generate-open-source-page; VITE_APP_VERSION=$(git describe --tags --always) vite
scripts.dev:android: ionic capacitor copy android && ionic capacitor run android -l --external
scripts.dev:ios: ionic capacitor copy ios && ionic capacitor run ios -l --external
scripts.build:development: npm run build:generate-open-source-page; tsc && VITE_APP_VERSION=$(git describe --tags --always) vite build --mode development
scripts.build:acceptance: npm run build:generate-open-source-page; tsc && vite build --mode acceptance
scripts.build:production: npm run build:generate-open-source-page; tsc && vite build --mode production
scripts.build:android:production:
npm run build:production && ionic capacitor copy --no-build android; echo 'open android studio and build a bundle
Build -> Generate Signed Bundle/APK -> Android App Bundle -> '
scripts.build:android:acceptance:
npm run build:acceptance && ionic capacitor copy --no-build android; echo 'open android studio and build a bundle
Build -> Generate Signed Bundle/APK -> Android App Bundle -> '
scripts.build:ios:production:
npm run build:production && ionic capacitor copy --no-build ios; echo 'open xcode and build a bundle
Run -> Archive -> Submit -> '
scripts.build:ios:acceptance:
npm run build:acceptance && ionic capacitor copy --no-build ios; echo 'open xcode and build a bundle
Run -> Archive -> Submit -> '
scripts.build:generate-open-source-page: cd generate-oss; npm ci --no-audit; npm run start
